abstract: In a letter to Senate leaders, a lawyer for Mr. Parnas outlined an array of evidence that he might offer at the trial.
lead_paragraph: As Senate Republicans appeared poised to block witnesses in President Trumpâ€™s impeachment trial, Lev Parnas, a former associate of Rudolph W. Giuliani who played a key role in the Ukrainian pressure campaign at the center of the proceeding, made a last-ditch bid to testify.
